languages.text: "Информация о данном союзе, а также астронаблюдения в данной звездной системе нивелируют логические нестыковки, обнаруженные ранее. Обвинение — единица Ксавьер Калькасар осуществляла хищение астрографических данных флота Осознание".

"This new information about a pact combined with the astro-observation data collected in this star system resolves the inconsistencies identified earlier. Unit Xavier Calcazar stands accused of stealing the astrographic records of the Cognisance Fleet."
languages.original_text: "Информация о данном союзе, а также астронаблюдения в данной звездной системе нивелируют логические нестыковки, обнаруженные ранее. Обвинение — единица Ксавьер Калькасар осуществляла хищение астрографических данных флота Осознание".

traits.locale_text: "The information about this pact, as well as astro-observations conducted in this star system, level the logical discrepancies discovered earlier. Charge — the individual by the name of Xavier Calcazar carried out the theft of the astro-graphical data of the Cognisance Fleet."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The information about this pact, as well as astro-observations conducted in this star system, level the logical discrepancies discovered earlier. Charge — the individual by the name of Xavier Calcazar carried out the theft of the astro-graphical data of the Cognisance Fleet."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Les informations sur ce pacte, associées aux données d'astro-observation recueillies dans ce système stellaire, résolvent les incohérences détectées plus tôt. L'unité Xavier Calcazar est accusée du vol de données astrographiques de la Flotte de la Connaissance. »
languages.original_text: "This new information about a pact combined with the astro-observation data collected in this star system resolves the inconsistencies identified earlier. Unit Xavier Calcazar stands accused of stealing the astrographic records of the Cognisance Fleet."

traits.locale_text: « Les informations sur ce pacte, ainsi que les astro-observations effectuées dans ce système stellaire, résolvent les incohérences détectées plus tôt. L'unité Xavier Calcazar est accusée du vol de données astrographiques de la Flotte de la Connaissance. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Esta nueva información sobre un pacto, en combinación con los datos de observación astral recogidos en este sistema estelar, resuelve las inconsistencias identificadas previamente. La unidad Xavier Calcazar queda acusada de robar los registros astrográficos de la Flota Conciencia».
languages.original_text: "This new information about a pact combined with the astro-observation data collected in this star system resolves the inconsistencies identified earlier. Unit Xavier Calcazar stands accused of stealing the astrographic records of the Cognisance Fleet."

traits.locale_text: «La información sobre este pacto, junto con las observaciones astrales realizadas en este sistema estelar, resuelve las inconsistencias identificadas previamente. Acusación: el individuo de nombre Xavier Calcazar es culpable del hurto de información astrográfica de la Flota Conciencia».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “基于这件事情的信息，同时基于在这个恒星系统中天文观测的数据结果，我找到了数据不一致的原因。指控：名叫希维尔·卡尔卡扎的单位窃取了真理开拓者舰队的天文数据。”
languages.original_text: "This new information about a pact combined with the astro-observation data collected in this star system resolves the inconsistencies identified earlier. Unit Xavier Calcazar stands accused of stealing the astrographic records of the Cognisance Fleet."

traits.locale_text: “基于这件事情的信息，同时基于在这个恒星系统中天文观测的数据结果，我对之前不一致的数据进行修正。指控：名叫希维尔·卡尔卡扎的单位窃取了真理开拓者舰队的天文数据。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Diese neue Information über einen Pakt in Kombination mit den Astrobeobachtungsdaten aus diesem Sternensystem lösen die zuvor identifizierten Inkonsistenzen. Einheit Xavier Calcazar wird vorgeworfen, die astrografischen Daten der Erkenntnisflotte gestohlen zu haben."
languages.original_text: "This new information about a pact combined with the astro-observation data collected in this star system resolves the inconsistencies identified earlier. Unit Xavier Calcazar stands accused of stealing the astrographic records of the Cognisance Fleet."

traits.locale_text: "Die Informationen zu diesem Pakt sowie in diesem Sternensystem vorgenommene Astro-Observationen beheben die zuvor identifizierten Inkonsistenzen. Anklage: Der Mann namens Xavier Calcazar hat den Diebstahl der astrografischen Daten der Erkenntnisflotte durchgeführt."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「この協定に関する情報と、この星系で収集された天文観測データにより、先に確認された矛盾が解消された。罪状：ザビエル・カルカサルという人物が、コグニサンス艦隊の天文画像データの窃盗を実行した」
languages.original_text: "This new information about a pact combined with the astro-observation data collected in this star system resolves the inconsistencies identified earlier. Unit Xavier Calcazar stands accused of stealing the astrographic records of the Cognisance Fleet."

traits.locale_text: 「この協定に関する情報と、この星系で実施された天文観測により、先に確認された矛盾が修正された。罪状：ザビエル・カルカサルという人物が、コグニサンス艦隊の天文画像データの窃盗を実行した」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bu yıldız sisteminde toplanan astro gözlem verileriyle birlikte anlaşmayla ilgili yeni edindiğimiz bilgiler, önceden tanımladığımız tutarsızlıkları ortadan kaldırıyor. Xavier Calcazar birimi, Malumat Filosu'nun astrografya kayıtlarını çalmaktan suçlu bulundu."
languages.original_text: "This new information about a pact combined with the astro-observation data collected in this star system resolves the inconsistencies identified earlier. Unit Xavier Calcazar stands accused of stealing the astrographic records of the Cognisance Fleet."
